inclusion.criterion: Severe aortic stenosis with ejection fraction less than 40%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Schedule to undergo aortic valve replacement
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior cardiac surgery including CABG or other valve replacement
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Mitral valve or aortic regurgitation and chronic kidney disease (Cr 1.5)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with ejection fraction less than 40% and is scheduled for aortic valve replacement. No prior cardiac surgery or endocarditis noted.
